titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide that psychologist services furnished by, or under arrangements made by, a hospice program are covered under Medicare.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to include psychologists' services within the definition of hospice care.
